General.Name: Fairchild Gold Corp
General.Description: Fairchild Gold Corp. engages in the exploration and acquisition of mineral property assets in Canada and North America. The company primarily explores for gold. It owns 100% interests in the Fairchild Lake property consisting of 25 single-cell and 108 multi-cell claims covering an area of approximately 2,224 hectares located in the Patricia Mining Division in north-western Ontario. Fairchild Gold Corp. was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Langley, Canada.
